page.title: 15Village Shops
page.content: There are not usually many{shops}in a village so the{village shop}really has to sell{everything.}The man who owns the main shop in Wentworth is{Mr. {Hobson}and he has worked there for 2 years. He gets up at{5 }each morning to deliver the papers to the people who live in Wentworth.In his{shop}he sells groceries, sweets, drinks, toys, wool and many other things. The other {shops}in Wentworth include a Post Office, Butcher, Hairdresser, Soft Toy Shop and Woodturner.In Harley there were only two{shops,}a Post Office which sold groceries as well and a fruit shop. Thorpe also had a few {shops.}The people who lived in the villages are quite happy with the shops they have. The newest type of {shops}opening in the area are{craft and{gift shops}and a{craft workshop has opened in{Wentworth Garden Centre.
